body.p: To His Excellency B. Magoffin Govr of Kentucky --

The undersigned citizens of Mercer & Boyle Counties, respectfully petition your Excellency to pardon James Duddleson who is now confined in the state Penitentiary -- they believe he ought to be pardoned, that some of us have heard that evidence on his trial, and would have acquitted him upon it -- and In veiw of the case and the time he has served, and the helpless condition of his wfie and children we pray his pardon -- 8th Dec 1861
